data.title: bd-1lk: Update review_reviewers projection to support re-requesting
data.description: Use ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE instead of INSERT OR IGNORE when applying ReviewersRequested events. This allows re-requesting the same reviewer to update their requested_at timestamp, enabling the re-review workflow.

data.reason: Security review: LGTM. Parameterized SQL queries maintained, no injection vectors. ON CONFLICT pattern matches existing reviewer_votes implementation.
